Title: 37302 - # Tips for Getting Your Invoices Paid Faster
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of four to eight tips small businesses should follow to get their invoices back faster. The resource links provide plenty of options for you to write about, including: having clients sign contracts, offering financial incentives to clients who pay early, and using electronic invoices. You can include the client link and keyword phrase by mentioning Sage One as accounting software that will let small businesses send invoices and accept payments online. Your target audience is business owners.
Anchor Text: online accounting software branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: online accounting software for invoicing

Title: 37306 - # Essential Programs for Start-Up Companies
Direction: 675 words. The number of start-up companies in the United States is growing at a rapid pace. These fledgling firms often operate on a shoestring, so they don't want to spend a lot of money on software, or buy programs that they don't really need. Give information about 4-8 programs that will be useful for helping start-up entrepreneurs run their businesses. Sage One should be one of these to easily incorporate the client link. Make sure it's the only accounting software to help diversify the article and also make sure there are no competitors mentioned. Write for an audience of tech-savvy, start- up entrepreneurs.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: using online accounting software
